Twenty7estore.title: Product Manager / Web Developer
Twenty7estore.subtitle: 27estore | 2019 to present
list: Utilized my expertise in React, Node.js, and MongoDB to design and develop an innovative in-house invoice management software that streamlines the company's billing process.
Elevated the company's product management by expertly overseeing all SKU's, effectively maintaining the company website and online store using Magento e-commerce CMS v2.3.
Demonstrated strong leadership skills by successfully supervising the warehouse team and operations, ensuring seamless incoming and outgoing shipments through effective coordination and organization.

usBext.title: Product Manager / CMS Support Specialist
usBext.subtitle: US Bext Ltd | 2016 to 2019
list: Demonstrated exceptional organizational and leadership skills by efficiently managing the company's products, incoming shipments, and inventory, ensuring accuracy and availability.
Supervised the warehouse and shipping department, executing smooth operations and elevating team productivity.
Utilized my technical expertise in Magento e-commerce CMS v1.9 to effectively manage the company's website and online store, driving online sales and improving customer experience.

africa_school.title: Volunteering in Africa
africa_school.subtitle: Umbuyisa School of Arts and Culture, Soweto Township, South Africa | 2022
list: Helped fundraise and participate in programs that support disadvantaged kids
Contributed to the growth and development of children in need by actively championing and participating in programs that provide educational and cultural opportunities.

africa_animals.title: Volunteering in Africa
africa_animals.subtitle: Living with Big Cats in Glen Afric, Hartbeespoort, South Africa | 2022
list: Engaged with a diverse range of African wild animals.

Gained hands-on experience and developed a deeper appreciation for wildlife conservation by engaging with a diverse range of African wild animals on a daily basis, including cleaning, feeding, and creating big cat enrichment programs.

amorpha.title: Event Staff Lead / Event Photographer
amorpha.subtitle: Amorpha Youth Organization | 2012 to 2016
list: Led and executed successful youth events and festivals in Varna, Bulgaria as the Event Staff Lead for a youth-focused organization.
Lead event photographer and content creator.
Demonstrated creativity and technical skill as the lead event photographer and content creator, with work published in local newspapers and magazines.
